house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1984 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Central Vacuum, Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, EatIn Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Gazebo, Great Room, Intercom System,Microwave, Pantry
